description: Update an existing time sheet line item classification

flags.name: --subject-types
flags.validation: Each value must be one of DriverDay, LaborRequirement, EquipmentRequirement, or CrewRequirement.

permissions: Only admin users can update time sheet line item classifications.
side_effects: Updates fields on a time sheet line item classification.
validation_notes: Provide the classification ID as an argument. At least one of --name, --description, or --subject-types is required. --name must be non-empty when provided. subject-types must be one of DriverDay, LaborRequirement, EquipmentRequirement, or CrewRequirement. subject-types cannot be changed if there are time sheet line items.
